long_description: the best of yoga and pilates in bolton - covering: westhoughton , horwich, aspull, adlington, egerton,bromley cross, bradshaw, harwood, farnworth, leigh, wigan & hindley. coreflex classes combine the very best elements of yoga and pilates, presented in a non-traditional but fun way - right here in westhoughton, bolton - and also in horwich and aspull. in a coreflex class the boundaries are completely dissolved, ensuring that you gain a cohesive and total workout to target improvements in core strength, flexibility and balance. yoga, pilates & fitness classes in westhoughton & horwich, bolton plus aspull, wigan.

generated_description: yoga pilates | bolton is a fitness company based in bolton, england, specializing in combining elements of yoga and pilates into a cohesive workout program. the company offers classes aimed at improving core strength, flexibility, balance, muscle tone, and cardio fitness. led by glenn jones, who has over fourteen years of experience in practicing yoga and pilates, the classes are designed to be both functional and enjoyable, suitable for all ages and fitness levels. the company operates in various locations including westhoughton, horwich, and aspull, providing a non-traditional approach to fitness training.
